-1.title: 10 years old Anmol learn to cook for his mother
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Chef extraordinaire Kunal Kapur decided to pack his favorite yellow table and travel to Mumbai and invite some special Mumbaikars to his kitchen. And true enough some very interesting personalities graced his kitchen to be treated to his signature dishes. The inimitable Yellow Table witnessed a lot of fun, food and hearty conversations. The guests on the show shared their culinary experiments, personal experiences and also got to try their hand at cooking with the Chef. They also picked up a cooking tip or two to try back home.
imdb.title: My Yellow Table
plot: Chef extraordinaire Kunal Kapur decided to pack his favorite yellow table and travel to Mumbai and invite some special Mumbaikars to his kitchen. And true enough some very interesting personalities graced his kitchen to be treated to his signature dishes. The inimitable Yellow Table witnessed a lot of fun, food and hearty conversations. The guests on the show shared their culinary experiments, personal experiences and also got to try their hand at cooking with the Chef. They also picked up a cooking tip or two to try back home.
